CustomField.description: This field is referenced by the Apex Scheduled Job: SkieGuestApproverActionDeleteSchedule to delete Approval Actions records. If the field (n) is "blank" the Approval Action records will be deleted after 30days; Otherwise the age of records to be deleted is based on TODAY - (n).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines the age (number of days) of Approver Actions records for scheduled deletion; Where "blank", the default is 30 days old.
CustomField.label: Number of Delete Approver action (Days)
